https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iscyA9VszCcbND5OzVjAIRBPnM9.jpg A young man who was sentenced to 7 years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending 30 years in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter ego, Charles Bronson. Bronson
